title: [Matthew Flinders: bi-centennial celebrations]
brief_description: Shows footage of the bicentennial celebrations in Great Britain of the explorer Matthew Flinders (born 1774-1814), including the “Explorer’s Window” at Lincoln Cathedral, several exhibits and an art exhibition detailing his life, and finally a presentation of a Memorial Stone by Sir Murray Porter to Lincolnshire to commemorate Matthew Flinders’ birthday. Commentary by John Hyfield. NB: No title or credits and film ends abruptly
